## itssl - a companion package for the TSL Intro To Statistics Course

`itssl` contains helper functions and tutorials to accompany the TSL training course 'Introduction To Statistics' - [https://danmaclean.github.io/intro_to_stats](https://danmaclean.github.io/intro_to_stats)

## Installation

```
#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("danmaclean/itssl")
```
